t: What are some Brands of Natural dog treats? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 4): Donate cash, not in-kind, whenever you possibly can. My rescue will not save another dog because someone gave us “natural” treats. We can save another dog if we have cash in hand for whatever the need is this week - boarding for a few days to pull a dog out of a shelter, ...

What are some healthy and natural brands of dog food available on Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer: Look for foods that have protein (and where the protein’s from) as the top ingredient. Stay away from foods that have grains in them. Make sure you read the label before buying and the freshness dates as well. Stay away from Kibbles n Bits, Purina and others like these brands.
